data.Title: Google Overhauls Video SEO Documentation
data.Description: Google has overhauled its video SEO documentation to vastly clarify the video indexing criteria and technical requirements. Plus, Google added a new watch page section to the document and expanded the examples in the document.

data.Title: Google Tests New Default Favicon Designs
data.Description: Google is testing new default favicon designs

data.Title: Google May Now Use OG Title for Title Links
data.Description: Google added a 9th source that Google Search may use for title links.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Impacts Sites
data.Description: This Google August 2024 core update has been shaking things up since it began to rollout.  We saw some early signs of some sites hit by the September 2023 helpful content see some signs of life. Then some saw reversals of sorts, but maybe that was the search ranking bug that got fixed a few days later. Here are some charts a week or so after the August core update was released.

data.Title: Google Says Low-Quality Traffic Doesn't Impact Rankings
data.Description: Google's Martin Splitt explains why low-quality traffic cannot have an effect on the trustworthiness of a website
